text: oba (kenekuṭa karana) yamkisi hon̆dak eḷidarav kaḷada, nætahot eya san̆gavā gattada, nætahot (keneku obaṭa kaḷa) yamkisi napurak san̆dahā oba samāva dunnada, (eya obaṭama itāmat aganēya. mandayat) niyata vaśayenma allāh (væradi valaṭa) itāmat kṣamā karanneku vaśayen hā (dan̆ḍuvam kirīmaṭa) balasampannayeku vaśayenda siṭinnēya
